content:
Today I chose PR 12345 for discussion!

feat(probability): define joint and marginal distributions
Created by @Rishikesh Vaishnav (@rish987) on 2022-02-27
Labels: awaiting-review, awaiting-CI

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
@Jason KY., is my understanding correct that we want a more general approach?
Then probably my understanding is incorrect :sweat: What should we do with the above PR?
It doesn't pass CI so my understanding is that we don't need to do anything yet
Is the content worth salvaging or not? Should I spend time making it pass CI?
I dont think I will need it but feel free to do so if you have some free time now that you are done with the exams
